snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission says Bank of America will pay $7.65 million to settle allegations that it overstated how much capital it had on its books....

headline.print_headline: Bank of America Paying $7.65M to Resolve Inquiry
headline.main: Bank of America Paying $7.65M to Resolve Inquiry

lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission says Bank of America will pay $7.65 million to settle allegations that it overstated how much capital it had on its books.
